verses.verse: Oh come <S%H3212><s%>, let us sing <S%H7442><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; Let us make a joyful noise <S%H7321><s%> to the rock <S%H6697><s%> of our salvation <S%H3468><s%>.
Let us come <S%H6923><s%> before his presence <S%H6440><s%> with thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%>; Let us make a joyful noise <S%H7321><s%> unto him with psalms <S%H2158><s%>.
For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is a great <S%H1419><s%> God <S%H410><s%>, And a great <S%H1419><s%> King <S%H4428><s%> above all gods <S%H410><s%>.
In his hand <S%H3027><s%> are the deep places <S%H4278><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>; The heights <S%H8443><s%> of the mountains are his also <S%H2022><s%>.
The sea <S%H3220><s%> is his <S%H6213><s%>, and he made it <S%H3027><s%>; And his hands formed <S%H3335><s%> the dry land <S%H3006><s%>.
Oh come <S%H935><s%>, let us worship <S%H7812><s%> and bow down <S%H3766><s%>; Let us kneel <S%H1288><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our Maker <S%H6213><s%>:

For he is our God <S%H430><s%>, And we are the people <S%H5971><s%> of his pasture <S%H4830><s%>, and the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of his hand <S%H3027><s%>. To-day <S%H3117><s%>, oh that ye would hear <S%H8085><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>!
Harden <S%H7185><s%> not your heart <S%H3824><s%>, as at Meribah <S%H4808><s%>, As in the day <S%H3117><s%> of Massah <S%H4531><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>;
When your fathers <S%H1><s%> tempted <S%H5254><s%> me <S%H974><s%>, Proved me <S%H7200><s%>, and saw my work <S%H6467><s%>.

Forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> long was I grieved <S%H6962><s%> with that generation <S%H1755><s%>, And said <S%H559><s%>, It is a people <S%H5971><s%> that do err <S%H8582><s%> in their heart <S%H3824><s%>, And they have not known <S%H3045><s%> my ways <S%H1870><s%>:
Wherefore I sware <S%H7650><s%> in my wrath <S%H639><s%>, That they should not enter <S%H935><s%> into my rest <S%H4496><s%>.
